text: I am trying to load this file into a dictionary, where using the word are the key values and the keys are actually auto-gen/auto-incremented for each word
below is the code i've hobbled together so far, it seems to sort of works but its only showing me the last entry in the file as the only dict pair element

code:
f3data = open('words')

mydict = {}

for line in f3data:
    print line.strip()
    cmyline = line.split()
    key = +1
    mydict [key] = cmyline

print mydict
